attributes.action: Vaccinate Early Years workers for Covid-19 alongside NHS and Care Workers
attributes.additional_details: I and many other Early Years Workers are continuing to work through this pandemic and a National lockdown with no PPE or Vaccination while we come into contact with numerous children and families a day putting not only ourself but our families at risk. In order for us to continue keeping staff and families safe, vaccinate Early Years Workers.
attributes.background: On the day the Government announces a National lockdown with Schools, Colleges and Universities to shut, Early Years Settings must remain open at full capacity with no PPE and no urgency for the vaccination to be given to the staff. Vaccinate your Early Years Workers who are also on the Frontline.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Prioritise early years practitioners to urgently receive Covid 19 vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566743

Prioritise teachers, school and childcare staff for Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316
